title: Could PS5 Get PS1, PS2, and PS3 Backwards Compatibly? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.09.20
description:
Greg and Blessing dive into what a Sony patent means for PlayStation 5, if physical games are about to die, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:00 - Housekeeping
Right after KFGD, we’re doing WHCF with Andy McNamara on his 29 years at Game Informer!
Every day this week a new part of Andy’s Full Playthrough of The Last of Us Part 2 will post at 3PM PT on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
We’re reacting to Ubisoft Forward on Sunday at noon pt.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:25 - PS1, PS2, and PS3 Backwards Compat Coming?! Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:26:19 - Um, Did Digital Games Just KO physical Games?
00:32:00 - At what point does physical media become not worth the effort?
Also, which company do you think will be first to drop physical media and when? - Best Friends Q:Parker Petrov
00:41:40 - Nintendo Mobile Games Have Strengthened Franchises, James Carr @ GameSpot
00:45:17 - A Sims TV Show, Julia Lee @ Polygon
00:52:00 - Out today
00:57:20 -  Quip
00:58:55 - Klarna
01:00:00 -  Hims
01:03:05 - Squad Up:Mark Freeman(Zoom twitter) - @theindieboy1
01:05:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Greg
